rows.label: qst201711_msg0001
rows.name:
Your Majesty! Are you
all right? No injuries?

rows.label: qst201711_msg1001
rows.name: Yes. I am unharmed. Everyone else?

rows.label: qst201711_msg2001
rows.name: All good! Everyone's fine.

rows.label: qst201711_msg2002
rows.name: That is good.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0002
rows.name:
Though now our attention must turn
to how our enemies managed to
infiltrate the training maneuver.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0003
rows.name:
It raises troubling questions
that must be answered.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0004
rows.name:
The imperial capital's defenses
must be reviewed and reconsidered.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0005
rows.name:
Ah! Can I help? I'm not sure
if I'd be any use, though...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0006
rows.name: Thank you for the offer.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0007
rows.name: You are very generous.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0008
rows.name: I wish I could do more!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0009
rows.name: I'm just doing what anyone would do.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0010
rows.name:
If I could perhaps ask you
to refrain from behaving quite
as recklessly in future.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0011
rows.name: Wh-what do you mean?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0012
rows.name: Did I do something wrong?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0013
rows.name: Not as such.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0014
rows.name:
But if you continue barreling
headlong through life as you are,
and the unthinkable happened...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0015
rows.name:
There are many who would mourn
your loss. Do not forget it.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0016
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0017
rows.name:
Please hold your own life in the
same high regard as the lives
of those you seek to rescue.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0018
rows.name: I-I will!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0019
rows.name:
I'll carve your words
onto my Core Crystal!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0020
rows.name: I pledge my allegiance to the Emperor!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0021
rows.name:
Shouldn't you be pledging
allegiance to your Driver?!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0022
rows.name: I'll pretend you said "to my Driver".

rows.label: qst201711_msg0023
rows.name:
I'd rather you pledged
allegiance to your Driver...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0024
rows.name:
If you're pledging allegiance to
anyone, shouldn't it be your Driver?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0025
rows.name: Huh? Oh, uh... I mean...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0026
rows.name:
Of course I pledge allegiance to
my Driver...but ALSO the Emperor.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0027
rows.name:
Just don't ask me to choose who
gets to be ranked higher...

rows.label: qst201711_msg0028
rows.name:
Because, um, I mean...er...
It's a tie! I can't decide!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0029
rows.name:
Ha ha! Cheeky so-and-so. Though
that's our Newt all over!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0030
rows.name:
Pfft. Cheeky beggar. Though
that's our Newt all over.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0031
rows.name: Hmph. That's just you all over, Newt!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0032
rows.name:
Wahaha! Cheeky blighter!
That's Newt all over!

rows.label: qst201711_msg0033
rows.name:
Me all over...? What's
that supposed to mean?

rows.label: qst201711_msg0034
rows.name: Hehehe.

rows.label: qst201711_msg0035
rows.name:
Now even the Emperor is laughing!
Knock it off, you guys!
